DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate long term efficacy , safety , tolerability repeat administration adalimumab subject Crohn 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Study Evaluate Long Term Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Repeated Dosing Subjects With Crohn 's Disease Who Participated Successfully Completed M14-115
DOC.criteria: Subject successfully enrol complete Study M14115 , include Week 12 ileocolonoscopy . If Week 12 ( Study M14115 ) colonoscopy show evidence dysplasia malignancy . Subject compliance prior concomitant medication requirement throughout M14115 . Subject develop active Tuberculosis ( TB ) M14115 , subject non compliant prophylaxis latent TB initiate per M14115 procedure .
